nodes.text: https://t.co/zsMNRCWrJa I don't give [Minneapolis] Chief Arradondo any brownie points for doing that because listen. He's in damage control mode still. He knew exactly who Derek Chauvin was. Derek Chauvin had 18 personnel complaints.

@palliddh People keep saying you can reform institutions from within.

Progressives join @TheDemocrats and are co-opted.

Blacks join #WhiteSupremacist gangs, a.k.a. police forces, and are complicit in murder.

It doesn't work. I'd be hard-pressed to come up with an example where it has.
